complaint_summary: Jewan filed a suit seeking a declaration that he was the lawful owner and in possession of the land in question, alleging that the registered sale-deed executed in favor of Hafiz Faiz Muhammad was fictitious, without consideration, and the result of fraud.
investigation_summary: The trial court framed issues including possession of the land, maintainability of the suit, fraud in execution of the sale-deed, and legality of the sale-deed. Evidence revealed that the plaintiff did not receive consideration for the sale and retained possession of the property.
judgment_summary: The appellate court found that the plaintiff had not received the consideration amount, retained possession of the property, and that the registered sale-deed did not pass title to the defendant. The trial court's judgment was set aside, and the plaintiff's suit was decreed in its entirety.
Decision_or_verdict: Appeal accepted; plaintiff's suit decreed with costs throughout.
legal_arguments: Non-payment of consideration invalidates the sale-deed.
Possession and delivery of the sale-deed are essential for transferring title.
Fraud in execution of the sale-deed renders it non-binding.

assets.description: Property in dispute claimed by Jewan.

witness_statement.Abdul Majid Jamil: Confirmed that Jewan did not sell the land, did not receive consideration, and retained possession. Stated that registration occurred due to fraud.

maxims.Non-payment of consideration: Strong evidence that the deed was not intended to operate.

legal_terms.Sale-deed: A legal document transferring ownership of property.
legal_terms.Mutation: Official change in property ownership records.

words_and_phrases.Fraud: Intentional deception to secure unfair or unlawful gain.

summary_vector_notes: The case revolves around allegations of fraud in the execution of a sale-deed, non-payment of consideration, and possession of disputed property. The appellate court ruled in favor of the plaintiff, declaring the sale-deed invalid and decreeing the suit with costs.
